thread.title: Khloe Attends Kim Kardashian's Troop Beverly Hills-Themed Baby Shower
thread.title_full: Khloe Attends Kim Kardashian's Troop Beverly Hills-Themed Baby Shower

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Khloe Attends Kim Kardashian's Troop Beverly Hills-Themed Baby Shower
text:
Comments Khloe and her sisters Kim, Kourtney, Kendall, and Kylie wore watching blue-and-white striped pajamas and posed for photos. 
Having been staying at Lamar Odom 's bed side since was he hospitalized after being found unconscious at a Nevada brothel earlier this month, Khloe Kardashian took a brief break from taking care of him to attend sister Kim Kardashian 's baby shower. She left the hospital to join the rest of the clan; Kendall Jenner , Kylie Jenner , and Kourtney Kardashian for the Troop Beverly Hills-themed shower that Kim threw at Alison Azoff's house in Beverly Hills on Sunday morning, October 25. She and all four of her sisters wore matching blue-and-white striped pajamas and camped out inside in mini tents. Kylie shared two photos from the shower on her Instagram page. "Baby shower vibes," she captioned one image that showed her and her sisters cuddling up on a sofa wearing the cute matching PJ's. "Just our usual morning routine," she captioned the other shot that showed her and Kourtney sitting in matching poses sipping tea from mugs in front of indoor teepees while wearing stunner shades. A photo posted by King Kylie (@kyliejenner) on Oct 25, 2015 at 11:06am PDT A photo posted by King Kylie (@kyliejenner) on Oct 25, 2015 at 10:37am PDT Khloe posted the similar snap on her Instagram and captioned it with, "Sister Sunday". It was reported that less than two hours later she left the shower and returned to Cedars-Sinai Medical Center, where she's been looking after Lamar. A photo posted by Khlo� (@khloekardashian) on Oct 25, 2015 at 1:45pm PDT Kim initially planned to hold the baby shower last weekend, but decided to postpone it to fly to Nevada to be with Khloe while she supported Lamar during his initial days of treatment at the Las Vegas Sunrise Hospital. The heavily pregnant star is expected to give birth to her second child with husband Kanye West in December.
